import React from 'react' import { useGlobalContext } from '../../context' import './BookDetails.css' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const BookDetails = () => { const {books} = useGlobalContext() const {id} = useParams(); const book = books.find(book => book.id === id) if(!book) { return console.error(); } return (
